products.name: Winstim
products.shortDescription: Winstim is a 4/2-channel electrotherapy and ultrasound device offering 4-pole and 2-pole interferential therapy along with a variety of electrical stimulation waveforms. It effectively treats acute and subacute trauma, inflammatory conditions, chronic rheumatoid and arthritic disorders, and provides reliable pain relief.
keyFeatures: 4 / 2 channel electrotherapy, multiple modalities in a single unit including combination of ultrasound and electrotherapy
A comprehensive reference library providing information on therapy, treatments and electrode placement
SD curve for interdependence between stimulus strength and the time required in activating the muscles
Treat and monitor multiple patients at the same time
Full-colour, 8” LCD touch screen displays for sharp & vivid detail
Tabletop device and can be mounted on optional mobility cart
Different treatment parameters can be saved for different patient
products.longDescription: Winstim is a 4/2-channel electrotherapy and ultrasound device offering 4-pole and 2-pole interferential therapy along with a variety of electrical stimulation waveforms. It effectively treats acute and subacute trauma, inflammatory conditions, chronic rheumatoid and arthritic disorders, and provides reliable pain relief.

userReviews.author: John D.
userReviews.comment: This device is a lifesaver! I've been struggling with chronic back pain for years, and the Winstim has made a huge difference.

userReviews.author: Jane S.
userReviews.comment: Great for post-workout recovery. Easy to use and very effective.

products.name: WinVac
products.shortDescription: WinVac is an advanced vacuum therapy system designed for easy and effective electrode placement using vacuum electrodes.
products.longDescription: WinVac is an advanced vacuum therapy system designed for easy and effective electrode placement using vacuum electrodes. Unlike conventional rubber electrodes, vacuum electrodes are quick to apply and ensure consistent skin contact for improved treatment outcomes. The pulsed vacuum creates a gentle massage effect, enhancing local blood circulation in the treated area. WinVac supports both continuous and pulsed modes, which can be easily adjusted using a control knob. It integrates seamlessly with electrotherapy devices to deliver multiple electrotherapy treatments. Made from biocompatible rubber, the vacuum electrodes can be securely applied to body areas where traditional electrodes are difficult to fix, ensuring greater flexibility and patient comfort.

products.name: SSD-500
products.shortDescription: SSD-500 is an advanced shortwave diathermy system with a solid-state generator and induction field circuitry.
products.longDescription: SSD-500 is an advanced shortwave diathermy system with a solid-state generator and induction field circuitry. Operating at a shortwave frequency of 27.12 MHz, it delivers deep penetration into muscle tissues with minimal heating of fatty layers or bone. Designed for use by trained professionals, it is ideal for physiotherapy, rehabilitation, and hospital settings.

products.name: AP439+
products.shortDescription: AP439 Plus is a cutting-edge, multi-waveform, multi-channel electrotherapy device designed for comprehensive pain relief.
products.longDescription: AP439 Plus is a cutting-edge, multi-waveform, multi-channel electrotherapy device designed for comprehensive pain relief. It supports a wide range of therapies including Interferential, TENS, Galvanic, and Russian currents. With comfortable stimulation and proven clinical results, AP439 Plus is an essential addition to any modern physiotherapy clinic.

products.name: Jus 2
products.shortDescription: Johari’s therapeutic ultrasound device delivers effective continuous and pulsed treatments for pain relief and muscle rehabilitation.
products.longDescription: Johari’s therapeutic ultrasound device delivers effective continuous and pulsed treatments for pain relief and muscle rehabilitation. It supports both 1 MHz and 3 MHz frequencies through a specially designed ultrasound applicator, ensuring targeted and efficient therapy. By increasing local blood flow, ultrasound therapy helps reduce swelling, manage chronic inflammation, and promote bone fracture healing—making it an essential modality for modern clinical practice.

products.name: NMS-498
products.shortDescription: NMS-498 is an advanced solution for pain management and muscle rehabilitation.
products.longDescription: NMS-498 is an advanced solution for pain management and muscle rehabilitation. This electronic nerve and muscle stimulator offers seven specialized NMES modes, each designed to target specific muscle groups. The microcomputer-controlled unit combines proven therapeutic techniques, delivering effective and customized rehabilitation to meet diverse clinical needs.
keyFeatures: Single machine with the benefit of dual therapies (TENS / EMS)
4 body areas / 2 patients can be treated at one time
Inbuilt 7 preset programs enabling treatment of different
One mode for custom parameter and custom treatment

products.name: Physiokit
products.shortDescription: Physiokit is a complete, portable solution that equips physiotherapists with all essential devices to deliver high-quality treatment at the patient’s location.
products.longDescription: Physiokit is a complete, portable solution that equips physiotherapists with all essential devices to deliver high-quality treatment at the patient’s location. Packed in a convenient backpack, it includes Stim 3 and JUS-1, enabling effective electrotherapy and ultrasound therapy for pain relief and rehabilitation.
keyFeatures: True sinewave IFT with four-pole application

products.name: Stim3
products.shortDescription: Stim3 is a US FDA 510(k)–cleared portable electrotherapy device designed for physiotherapists and home care professionals.
products.longDescription: Stim3 is a US FDA 510(k)–cleared portable electrotherapy device designed for physiotherapists and home care professionals. It enables effective pain relief for both acute and chronic conditions while supporting mobility and overall wellness during home visits. Compact and versatile, Stim3 delivers multiple therapies in a single handheld unit, making it one of the most trusted devices in physical therapy.
keyFeatures: True sinewave IFT with four-pole application
EMS, IFT, and TENS therapy modes

products.name: Stim Tec4
products.shortDescription: Interferential Electrical Stimulation (IFS) is an advanced therapy that delivers therapeutic frequencies deep into body tissues.
products.longDescription: Interferential Electrical Stimulation (IFS) is an advanced therapy that delivers therapeutic frequencies deep into body tissues. It uses two medium-frequency currents—one fixed at 4,000 Hz and another adjustable between 4,001–4,150 Hz. The interaction of these currents allows stimulation to reach deeper tissues while also acting on the skin surface, resulting in enhanced pain relief and nerve-blocking effects.

products.name: Stim Tec2
products.shortDescription: Stimtec is a portable electrotherapy device designed for effective muscle strengthening and pain relief.
products.longDescription: Stimtec is a portable electrotherapy device designed for effective muscle strengthening and pain relief. It features dual therapeutic modes—TENS and EMS—to relieve pain, stimulate muscles, and enhance rehabilitation outcomes. Compact and easy to use, Stimtec is one of the most popular and trusted devices in physical therapy.

products.name: NishCalm
products.shortDescription: NishCalm is a portable, safe, and effective sleep-inducing and relaxation device.
products.longDescription: NishCalm is a portable, safe, and effective sleep-inducing and relaxation device. Using CES (Cranial Electrotherapy Stimulation) technology, it enhances energy levels, improves mood, and promotes deep, restorative sleep—without the use of drugs. Designed for ease of use and portability, NishCalm is ideal for everyday wellness and on-the-go lifestyles.

products.name: VR System
products.shortDescription: SparshMind is dedicated to delivering high-quality, accessible care for individuals with neurological disabilities through innovative technology and empathetic design.
products.longDescription: SparshMind is dedicated to delivering high-quality, accessible care for individuals with neurological disabilities through innovative technology and empathetic design. Its automated, immersive virtual reality–based therapies are built to maximize patient engagement and long-term adherence.
keyFeatures: Detection and correction of compensatory patterns
Monitoring of endurance, strength, and speed

products.name: Limb Compression Therapy Device
products.shortDescription: This limb compression therapy device enhances blood circulation and helps relieve symptoms caused by inactivity, injury, or poor vascular flow.
products.longDescription: This limb compression therapy device enhances blood circulation and helps relieve symptoms caused by inactivity, injury, or poor vascular flow. By improving venous and lymphatic drainage, it supports edema reduction and capillary reabsorption. Available in 4-chamber models with hand, waist, and leg cuffs, it is suitable for both clinical and home use.
keyFeatures: Eases muscle pain from inactivity or post-trauma

products.name: Chiropractic Table
products.shortDescription: A versatile and cost-effective chiropractic table designed to deliver maximum treatment flexibility for modern practices.
products.longDescription: A versatile and cost-effective chiropractic table designed to deliver maximum treatment flexibility for modern practices. Featuring manual drop activation with adjustable tension, it supports precise cervical, thoracic, lumbar, and pelvic treatments.
keyFeatures: Electric Hi-Lo operation via hand remote or foot remote (optional)
Four manually activated drop sections: Cervical, Thoracic, Lumbar & Pelvic
Gas-strut assisted lift with ±20° dynamic adjustment
4 retractable castors with central locking mechanism for easy transport (optional)

products.name: Ilux smart
products.shortDescription: Advanced smart laser therapy device.

products.name: Ilux plus
products.shortDescription: High-power laser therapy device for clinical settings.

products.name: Physo laser 1000
products.shortDescription: Professional 1000mW laser therapy device.

products.name: Physo laser - 2
products.shortDescription: Versatile dual wavelength laser therapy device.

products.name: Opton pro 10
products.shortDescription: Opton pro 10 for deep tissue laser therapy.

products.name: Opton pro 15
products.shortDescription: Opton pro 15 for high intensity laser therapy.

products.name: Physhock
products.shortDescription: Portable shockwave therapy device.

products.name: Impuls - 2
products.shortDescription: Dual channel shockwave therapy device for clinical use.

products.name: Impuls pro
products.shortDescription: Professional high-frequency shockwave therapy device.

products.name: Fit Must
products.shortDescription: Tool for assessing muscle strength.

products.name: Fit knees
products.shortDescription: Tool for assessing knee function and rehabilitation progress.

products.name: Polar care wave
products.shortDescription: Combines cold therapy and compression.

products.name: Cryo 6
products.shortDescription: Cryo therapy for skin cooling in dermatological treatments.

products.name: Cryo 7
products.shortDescription: Advanced cryo therapy system for pain management.

products.name: Tecar smart
products.shortDescription: Smart and portable Tecar therapy device.

products.name: Diacare 7000
products.shortDescription: Professional high-power Tecar therapy device.

products.name: Diacare 5000
products.shortDescription: Effective Tecar therapy device for clinical use.

products.name: Neurological Bobath Table
products.shortDescription: Purpose-built for rehabilitation, this strong two-section neurological Bobath table is designed with the therapist in mind, offering an extra-wide tabletop and flexible patient positioning.
keyFeatures: Electric Hi-Lo operation via hand remote or foot remote
Super-wide tabletop (120 cm) for patient and therapist comfort
Head section with three face holes and removable plugs
Sleek design with rounded frame legs for enhanced safety
75 mm retractable castors for mobility and safety (optional)
products.longDescription: This purpose-built two-section neurological Bobath table is designed specifically for rehabilitation therapy. Its extra-wide tabletop provides ample space for both patient and therapist, while multiple face holes allow greater flexibility during treatment. The electric Hi-Lo height adjustment ensures ease of use, safety, and ergonomic comfort during therapy sessions.

products.name: Split Leg Treatment Table
products.shortDescription: Specially designed split-leg treatment table offering enhanced functionality, superior stability, and ergonomic comfort for therapists and patients.
keyFeatures: Electric split-leg operation via hand remote or foot remote
Sleek, modern design with rounded frame legs for added safety
Head section with face hole and removable plug
75 mm retractable castors for mobility and safety (optional)
Specially designed split-leg backrest for enhanced functionality and superior stability
products.longDescription: This split-leg treatment table is designed to meet the demands of modern physiotherapy and rehabilitation clinics. Featuring electric split-leg adjustment, ergonomic armrests, and a stable, safety-focused frame, it ensures optimal positioning, therapist comfort, and patient safety during a wide range of treatments.

products.name: Postural Drainage Treatment Table
products.shortDescription: A preferred choice among physiotherapists, this five-section postural drainage table offers smooth electric Hi-Lo operation and precise postural drainage control with a wide range of head and backrest motion.
keyFeatures: Electric Hi-Lo operation via hand remote or foot remote
Electric postural drainage operation via foot switch
Sleek, modern design with rounded frame legs for enhanced safety
Head section with face hole and removable plug
75 mm retractable castors for mobility and safety (optional)
Five-section design with wide range of motion for head and backrest

products.name: Unweighing Harness System
products.shortDescription: The Unweighing Harness System enables partial weight-bearing therapy with open patient access, supporting early rehabilitation in a safe and controlled environment.
keyFeatures: Enables controlled offloading of body weight for early rehabilitation
Allows open access to the patient for hands-on therapist facilitation
Assists posture and balance during gait and standing therapy
Enables weight bearing as per therapeutic requirement
Provides stability to the trunk and spine
products.longDescription: The Unweighing Harness System is designed to support partial weight-bearing rehabilitation by safely offloading a controlled percentage of a patient’s body weight. This allows early mobilization while maintaining stability and safety for both patient and therapist. The open-access design enables therapists to focus on treatment and manually facilitate lower-limb movements, making it ideal for neurological and geriatric rehabilitation programs.
